title: feat: improve error dashboard with percentages and filtering
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Clearer signals
gist.blurb: Upgraded the internal error dashboard to track percentages instead of raw counts. Easier to spot when things go sideways.
gist.summary: Converted error dashboard panels to percentage-based rates and added provider filtering for better observability.
gist.impact: Internal monitoring is now more accurate, allowing faster detection of provider-specific issues.
gist.visual_concept: The Monitor Robot analyzing a large data screen with the Bee. Represents internal monitoring tools.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chunky robot with a monitor head pointing excitedly at a large screen displaying a line graph. The bee mascot hovers nearby holding a clipboard. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft blue gradient background. Screen glows with data. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel text on screen: 'STATS'. Nostalgic and technical.
